Ἰδὼν <WG3708> Idōn saw this , δὲ <WG1161> de But ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous [when] Jesus ἠγανάκτησεν <WG23> ēganaktēsen He was indignant καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Ἄφετε <WG863> Aphete “ Let τὰ <WG3588> ta the παιδία <WG3813> paidia little children ἔρχεσθαι <WG2064> erchesthai come πρός <WG4314> pros to με <WG1473> me Me , μὴ <WG3361> mē [and] do not κωλύετε <WG2967> kōlyete hinder αὐτά <WG846> auta them ! τῶν <WG3588> tōn to γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τοιούτων <WG5108> toioutōn such [as these] . ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin belongs ἡ <WG3588> hē the βασιλεία <WG932> basileia kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God
